title: 2025 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix start time: how to watch, live stream and F1 schedule
summary: Round five of the 2025 Formula 1 season wraps up the first triple-header of the year in Saudi Arabia. There are the dates and start time for the Jeddah event, including all sessions

qa_pairs.question: What is a triple-header in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A series of three consecutive races held on weekends.
wrong_options: A special event featuring three races in one day.
A race with three different formats.
A team that competes in three different championships.

qa_pairs.question: Which country hosted the fifth round of the 2025 Formula 1 season?
What is typically included in the schedule for a Formula 1 race weekend?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Practice sessions, qualifying, and the race.
wrong_options: Only the race and the podium ceremony.
Practice sessions and a fan meet-and-greet.
